extendedInfo.description: Pixel Media Server  is UPNP/DLNA compatible Digital Media Server on Android Platform (SmartPhone, Tablet, STB/TV). It shares digital media contents, such as Images (JPEG/PNG), songs (MP3, WAVE, FLAC etc.), videos (AVI, MP4, 3GP, MPEG, MPG, MKV, FLV, TS, MOV etc.) from your Android Device (SmartPhone/Tablet/Set-Top-Box) and make those contents available on wired/wireless network for other UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices, such as SmartTV, BlueRayPlayer, XBOX, Play Station, Android TV/STB/Player and many more devices.Pixel Media Server (Pixel DMS) can be discovered from home network using Digital Media Controller (DMC) or Digital Media Player (DMP). Using DMC or DMP, user can browse all media contents which are shared on Pixel Media Server from your Android Smart Phone/ Tablet and media contents can play back to  "dlna-compliant" Render or Player, such as TV etc.There is no need for additional Media Servers, if you have Pixel Media Server running on your Android SmartPhone/ Tablet/ Set-Top-Box. Pixel Media Server is tested with well known UPNP/DLNA compliant/certified devices and various Android platform.Features:*	"UPNP/DLNA" Compatible Digital Media Server for Android Platform*	Support SSDP protocol for DMS discovery*	User can Start DMS and Stop DMS with a single click from your Android phone*	Share your complete mobile contents or select your desire folder *	Set your DMS name as you wish*	App autostart on device boot*	On screen message for WiFi on/off*	On screen message for DMS on/off*	Keep track last folder selection from the server for  next application launching*	Support multiple device connections for media streaming from DMS*	Pixel Media Server runs on Android Phones and Tablets and Android Set-Top-Box*	Support multiple external storage device selection*	Support popular video file formats: MKV, AVI, MPG, MP4, M4V, MPEG, TS etc.*	Extended M3U playlist file supported. [you can share other servers contents (any HTTP server) to your network from Pixel Media Server]*	Support WiFi/Tethering/Ethernet*	Image Thumbnail*	Video Thumbnail*	Music AlbumArt*	Support Subtitle (only SRT)Please provide your valuable feedback on Pixel Media Server (v 6.0).Please have a look for our other "dlna-compliant" apps on Android platform from CMC Limited.Digital Media Controller: "Pixel Media Controller â DLNA" Digital Media Renderer: "Pixel Media Renderer â DLNA DMR" Printing controller (+PR1+):	"CMC DLNA Print Client"  Daily Utility App:Scanner and Fax : "CMC Image Scanner"For any queries or issue related to Pixel Media server, please send e-mail to   android@cmcltd.comWe are happy to help you.Disclaimer: This app is not DLNA certified solution and this app is not claiming that "App has passed interoperability testing standards approved, endorsed or sponsored by DLNA". This application is not certified by DLNA Organization (www.dlna.org) or its associate partner and we are not listed Member Company of this organization. DLNAÂ® is trade mark of DLNA Organization.TAG: DLNA, UPnP, Server, Media Server, Video, DMS, Streaming, DMR, DMC, Media Controller, Remote, HTTP, Pixel-DMS, Pixel DMS, Media Player

reviews.title: Ps3 and pc awesome!
reviews.comment: Simple, functional, works better than any other i have tried. This one would actually be worth paying for.

reviews.title: PS3? This gem actually works
reviews.comment: This is a highly underrated little app that works very well with PS3. Where almost all the other apps get DLNA protocol errors after a minute or two of use, this one doesn\'t. It remains my #1 choice in category.
reviews.author: Carel Cornelius

reviews.title: works first time with ps3
reviews.comment: simple, once you have set up your root directory on your android device, the PS3 picks up the dlna connection then plays your videos...  simple, and it works without any crashing.
